description:
Maou thirsts for a TV, Emi learns some shocking news, and Urushihara schools us all on how to be proper NEETs.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le Roi-démon insiste lourdement pour acheter une télé
Maou, Terebi Kounyuu o Kyoukou ni Shuchou Suru
The Devil Adamantly Insists on Buying a TV
魔王, テレビ購入を強硬に主張する
